description: Looking like Superman's little brother with a body to match, Evan came exploding in the door like the Boy of Steel after a double espresso. Fresh from the gym, his smile just lit up the room and his boundless energy was contagious.Fortunately for us, no X-ray vision glasses were needed as this 21 year old loves to be naked.  His torso looks like a fitness ad and seeing those massive biceps flex and those incredible pecs pump up when he grabs his dick is a sight to behold!Many straight guys get very nervous about showing their rear assets but not our Evan. He was downright eager to bend over, reach back and show off his err, hole portfolio. When it was time to burn off that pent up sexual frustration, no X-ray glasses were required then either - he moans, leans back and sends his little action figures blasting out all over the table
title: Superboy Thirst, Scene #02
